original_text: And when David enquired of the Lord, he said, Thou shalt not go up; but fetch a compass behind them, and come upon them over against the mulberry trees.
korean_text: 다윗이 여호와께 여쭈니 이르시되 올라가지 말고 그들 뒤로 돌아서 뽕나무 수풀 맞은편에서 그들을 기습하되

sentences.original_text: And when David enquired of the Lord
but fetch a compass behind them
and come upon them over against the mulberry trees
